### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #18038 (P2P: Mempool tracks locally submitted transactions to improve wallet privacy by amitiuttarwar)
* #17479 (Return BlockValidationState from ProcessNewBlock if CheckBlock/AcceptBlock fails by jnewbery)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.<!--2502f1a698b3751726fa55edcda76cd3-->
